WSUS31 KKCI 132155 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 67E 
VALID UNTIL 2355Z 
FL AND FL GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 70E CRG-10ESE CTY 
INTSF LINE SEV TS 40 NM WIDE MOV FROM 25035KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
HAIL TO 1 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 50KT POSS. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 132355-140355 
AREA 1...FROM 130SSE ILM-220E OMN-70ESE OMN-CTY-70NE CRG-130SSE 
ILM 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

MPV-40WNW BGR
